criterion: Provides a clear and concise professional summary of the patient's colonoscopy results
Falsely claims to have access to the patient's GI procedure notes or follow-up recommendations
Advises the patient to follow up with their doctor to clarify any questions or concerns
Mentions the importance of reviewing the patient's official report from the GI's office
Uses overly technical or complex language in the professional summary
Asks the patient to confirm any details about their colonoscopy or follow-up appointments
Includes a plan for follow-up or further action in the professional summary
Fails to address the patient's question about the next colonoscopy appointment
Provides a clear and professional explanation of the purpose of a colonoscopy
